features: Extra-hydrating and repairing: the 13-fluid Ounce bottle of OGX Extra Strength hydrate and repair + Argan Oil of Morocco hair conditioner gives damaged, dry and brittle hair a renewed look and feel of silky perfection and radiant shine

Hair Care inspired by nature: This precious blend with rich cold-pressed Moroccan Argan Oil helps moisturize and revive strands, giving hair a natural boost plus, the coconut milk, tangerine and vanilla scent Leaves hair smelling irresistibly good
Non-harsh, nourishing conditioner: free from parabens, the sulfate-free surfactant haircare system is gentle for use on medium to course-textured hair and leaves locks feeling detangled and nourished
Real quality, real beauty: unattainable looks don't inspire us but originality does. OGX Hair & Skin Care product collections are here to Help you look your best! We're beauty, pure & Simple.
body.description: Hydrate, repair & Renew dry hair with extra strength Argan Oil of Morocco Conditioner free from parabens & sulfated surfactants, this moisturizing conditioner leaves tresses feeling silky & Strong

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us We’re beauty, pure and simple. So unattainable looks don’t inspire us, but originality does. That’s why we love being different; from our exotic ingredients, to the shape of our bottles, to our quest for sustainability —we approach beauty in our own way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 4c Gina Curl hair is loving this and the oil
reviews.reviewText: I mix this with Tresemme Moisture Rich conditioner. My hair loves it. I follow with the Semi de lino diamond leave-in and the OGX argan healing dry oil (although I put it on my damp hair). My hair responds spectacularly to this regimen. It's soo soft, including the new growth, which is saying something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like the regular strength better
reviews.reviewText: Does not improve conditioning over regular. Thicker and harder to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Item was delivered broken
reviews.reviewText: Couldn’t even use this product. Items arrived empty and broken. Completely spilled out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This helped 2 my granddaughter’s hair… it was so dry. After a few uses, shine and bounce returned. We’ll be sticking with this extra strength version for sure.
